name: A game about a trash can (ANIVERSARY REMAKE)
name_original: A game about a trash can (ANIVERSARY REMAKE)
description:
it's been a year since the release of the mistake known as "a game about a trash can", so to comemorate that i made the mistake better!

fully remade sprites and graphics!

new music!

2 player mode! (local)

better game!

Enjoy this stupid thing that i made and say "happy birthday!" to the small golden trash can!
